Job Title: Senior Consultant at Wockhardt Hospitals Ltd

Experience Data.title: Chief - Critical Care
Experience Data.description:
Leading a team of committed individuals, to put out their best in saving lives in the Critical Care setup. I firmly believe in the concept of Healthcare with Compassion, which ideal I strive for daily. Being amidst tough, challenging cases in the ICU is thrilling, yet dealing with their distressed kin is equally difficult.

One aspect of my profile is administrative responsibilities, conducting regular training sessions, overseeing the Quality Process, being part of the NABH accreditation process, team motivation and overall supervision to ensure smooth running of a high intensity, high turnover 27 bedded critical care unit.

Education Data.schoolName: Government Medical College, South Gujarat University
Education Data.degreeField: Doctor of Medicine (MD), Internal Medicine Residency Program
